onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome, Caster
onboarding.welcome.subtitle: A brief orientation before we proceed
onboarding.welcome.body: Thaumic Cast channels audio from your browser to your Sonos speakers. Think of it as a magical conduit, except the magic is networking and the wand is a browser extension.
onboarding.desktop.title: The Desktop App
onboarding.desktop.subtitle: Your local anchor to the speaker realm
onboarding.desktop.found: Excellent. The Desktop App is present and accounted for.
onboarding.desktop.not_found_title: The Desktop App Has Not Been Summoned
onboarding.desktop.not_found_body: The Desktop App serves as the bridge between your browser and your speakers. Without it, we're shouting into the void.
onboarding.desktop.download_prompt: You'll need to install it first:
onboarding.speakers.title: Your Speakers Await
onboarding.speakers.subtitle: Let's see who's listening
onboarding.speakers.none_found: No speakers have made themselves known
onboarding.speakers.hint: Ensure your speakers are powered on and the Desktop App is running.
onboarding.ready.title: All Systems Nominal
onboarding.ready.subtitle: You're ready to cast
onboarding.ready.performance_body: Audio travels through your local network. Latency is typically 100–300ms — noticeable for games, imperceptible for music and video.
onboarding.ready.tip_1: Wired connections are more reliable than WiFi
onboarding.ready.tip_2: Close proximity to your router helps
onboarding.ready.tip_3: 5GHz WiFi generally outperforms 2.4GHz for this purpose
